permafrost.tundra.lang

Class IterableHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.IterableHelper

  • public final class IterableHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Iterable objects.

    • Method Detail

      • join

        public static <E> java.lang.String join(java.lang.Iterable<E> iterable,
                                        java.lang.String separator)
        Returns a string created by concatenating each element of the given iterable, separated by the given separator string.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The class of element stored in the iterable.
        Parameters:
        iterable - The iterable whose contents are to be joined.
        separator - An optional separator string to be used between elements of the iterable.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the given iterable created by concatenating together the string representation of each element in order, optionally separated by the given separator string.

      • join

        public static <E> java.lang.String join(java.lang.Iterable<E> iterable,
                                        java.lang.String separator,
                                        boolean includeNulls)
        Returns a string created by concatenating each element of the given iterable, separated by the given separator string.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The class of element stored in the iterable.
        Parameters:
        iterable - The iterable whose contents are to be joined.
        separator - An optional separator string to be used between elements of the iterable.
        includeNulls - If true, null values will be included in the output string, otherwise they are ignored.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the given iterable created by concatenating together the string representation of each element in order, optionally separated by the given separator string.

      • stringify

        public static java.lang.String[] stringify(java.lang.Iterable iterable)
        Converts an Iterable object to a String[].
        Parameters:
        iterable - The object to convert.
        Returns:
        The String[] representation of the object.
